about_the_game:
Ciao!
This is a donation DLC.
Purchasing it will not add any content to the game.
Memory Hunters was made by a single indie game developer who independently developed and financed the project over the course of 2 years.
Purchase this DLC only if you want to support my work.
Your help could support the development of a new adventure!
Thank you
